__e: I'll try to be a good husband to you and a good father to your children.
Look, Just come out here... and I will try to be anyone that you want me to be, okay?
I'll try to be a good father to your children and a good husband to you.
I'm gonna try to make it work with Tom.
Um, and if they're not, then I'll try to make them better, but you gotta... tell me what's wrong.
Sir, I think I know what you're going to say... and I want you to know... that I will try to make Wendy as happy as I can.
I'll try and call you again before I leave.
Darling, I'll always try to make you as happy as your father wanted you to be.
If that's true, then I will try and find you another job-- even though it took almost two decades to find one this good.
Now I shall try very hard to remember all your names, but it's going to be easier for you because you've only got one to remember, and that's Miss Mayfield.
I'll try to remember not to.
Don't try to walk in my shoes, and I won't try to walk in yours.
I told them that you're very busy and I will try to marry better next time.
I'll let you in, if that's what it takes, I'll let you in. It's just sometimes I'm afraid that if I do, you'll see the real me, the guy I was before you.
Well, I'm gonna try not to take that personally.
Why, yes, I suppose I am... yes it's a way of looking at it, but I'll try not to look at it too often!
Well, I will try not to take it too personally that you're sounding more excited about this trip than our trip.
I haven't gotten through on her number, but I'll try again.
We'll try again in a minute.
I'll give it another shot and see if I can do better.
I'll give it another shot and see if I can do better.
